Set with an Alice band and wand. Satin-covered, plastic Alice band with glittery mesh and a glittery appliqué in the shape of a witch’s hat with a fluffy spider on top. Plastic wand with a glittery cobweb and satin and mesh straps.
Fabric-covered, steel wire hairband that can be opened out and tied in different ways. Length approx. 74 cm.

Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.

KATE MORGAN x H&M. Alice band in plastic covered in patterned satin with a decorative bow on the top.

Short coat in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with narrow notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Dropped shoulders, wide turn-ups at the cuffs, large patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with decorative stitching at the shoulders and cuffs, collar with decorative buttons on the lapels and decorative shoulder tabs. Diagonal zip at the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.

Trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a slight sheen and a wide jersey waistband for a comfortable fit. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, sewn-in creases and a gentle flare to the hem.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a pleated weave made partly from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Elasticated drawstring seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and extra-wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a wide belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake back pockets. Wide, tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a wide belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake back pockets. Wide, tapered legs with creases.
Cotton twill cap with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.

Calf-length dress in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with a halter neck and smocking at the top. Seam at the waist and a softly draping flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Maxi dress in an airy crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Cut-out section with narrow, covered elastic across the back, and a flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and seams on the legs. Zipped front pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and seams on the legs. Zipped front pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Short dress in a crinkled weave with glittery stripes and frills. Small opening with ties at the neckline, short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim, and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with inset lace sections, rounded, double shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared lower section.

Sleeveless romper suit and T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Romper suit with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch, a small chest pocket with appliqués and short legs with elasticated hems. T-shirt with lapped shoulders.
Romper suit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Decorative buttons at the top, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves and hems.
Imitation leather belt with a patterned imitation suede front and a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
